about_the_game:
Defend the Gates from a demonic invasion and become a hero!

Your mission is to protect the Gates that hold back endless hordes of demons, eager to break through and destroy the peaceful inhabitants of the kingdom. In this epic battle, you will be guided by a wise mentor — an old warrior whose advice will lead you to victory against overwhelming forces.

Choose one of four unique heroes, each with their own style of combat and abilities. Upgrade and enhance your chosen hero's skills to adapt to the ever-growing threats and discover new strategies to combat the terrifying forces of evil.

Key Features:

Four Unique Heroes: Each hero has their own playstyle and skill set. Choose the one that best suits your strategy and master their abilities.

Advice from a Wise Mentor: A seasoned veteran will offer you valuable guidance that may turn the tide of battle… but should you always follow his advice?

Upgrade System: Develop your hero, improve their abilities, and create your own unique build to face the most dangerous enemies.

Epic Battles Against Demons: Prepare for intense battles where every decision, skill, and upgrade can change the course of the fight.

Are you ready to stop the demons and save the kingdom? The fate of the world is in your hands!

name: Gatestodian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
